abstract: Don't let a snail get in the way, or else!
description: Two old men are playing for the champion's rosette in lawn bowls when a snail interupts play and causes one codger to win and the other to lose. The battle takes on a greater moral dimension...Animation and live action. Cast: Lisle Jones, John Keightley
